A: What is the value of 9 in the number 983? (a) Thousand (b) Hundred (c) Tens?
What is the value of 8 in the number 581? (a) Unit (b) Hundred (c) Tens?
What is the value of 1 in the number 981? (a) Units (b) Tens (c) Hundreds?
B: Ciara had a ninth birthday party. There were 12 friends at her party. Half of Ciara's friends are _________ years old, and the other half are _________ years old. A quarter of her friends brought _________ presents, while the rest brought _________ presents. Ciara received _________ toy cars, _________ dolls, _________ storybooks, _________ art supplies, and _________ a pet hamster.
